mapper.select: select distinct user_name as userName from ${tableName}

select count(distinct user_name) from ${tableName} where user_type=1
and user_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName}),'%')

select distinct(user_name) as userName,sum(trans_count) as transCount, max(trans_hashs) as hashs, max(modify_time) as time from ${tableName} where user_type=1
and user_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName}),'%')
group by user_name
limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(distinct contract_address) from ${tableName} where trans_unusual_type=1
and contract_address like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractAddress}),'%')

select distinct(contract_address) as contractAddress,max(contract_name) as contractName,sum(trans_count) as transCount, max(trans_hashs) as hashs,max(modify_time) as time from ${tableName} where trans_unusual_type=1
and contract_address like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractAddress}),'%')
group by contract_address
limit #{start},#{pageSize}
